desc: The racing simulator your partner might appreaciate! This wheelstand / simrig allows for immersive simracing from the comfort of your own couch and It has been tested with common racingwheels of Logitech, Fanatec and Thrustmaster. Finished with a herringbone oak or walnut tray it stores away as a table or plantstandl

layout.text: The racing simulator your partner might appreciate!

Delivery for CoffeeRacer 'Living' in 2 to 5 working days
